catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 292; P0083-003.3
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed: preparatory drawing of a woman sitting on the ground wrapped in large robe, holding long object in hands; open scroll with tassel in front of woman on ground; woman is looking up slightly with a smile; bamboo in background
title: Preparatory drawing for the left sheet of the triptych Elegant Instrumental Trio of Girls
